name: Space Survivor (S.G. Productions)
description:
Space Survivor: How long can you survive?

A simple bullet hell game we made for our own learning purposes. This version was made in Godot, but we actually also made a Unity version before this.

Controls: WASD or Arrows, or D-Pad on a controller. You'd still need a mouse to click on the start button though for now...

Inspired by something we played a very long time ago, but can't remember what it was...
